layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  RenderView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x88
  RenderBlock {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x88
    RenderBody {BODY} at (8,16) size 784x64
      RenderBlock {P} at (0,0) size 784x16
        RenderText {#text} at (0,0) size 195x16
          text run at (0,0) width 195: "There should be no red below."
      RenderBlock {DIV} at (0,32) size 80x32 [bgcolor=#FF0000]
        RenderBlock {DIV} at (0,0) size 80x16 [bgcolor=#0000FF]
        RenderImage {IMG} at (0,16) size 80x16 [bgcolor=#FFFF00]
